Package edu.slu.prog2

Class MixedFraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.slu.prog2.Fraction
      • edu.slu.prog2.MixedFraction
  • public class MixedFraction
extends edu.slu.prog2.Fraction
    This class enables the manipulation of mixed fractions and inherited some of its functions from the Fraction class.
    Author:
    Pineda, Benedict Jr. and Calica, Gwyneth

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MixedFraction()
      Constructs a mixed fraction with a fixed value for the numerator(0), denominator(1), and the whole number(0).
      MixedFraction​(int numerator, int denominator, int whole)
      Constructs a mixed fraction with a given numerator, denominator, and whole number
      MixedFraction​(int whole, edu.slu.prog2.Fraction fraction)
      Constructs a mixed fraction with a given whole number and a given fraction.
      MixedFraction​(edu.slu.prog2.Fraction fraction)
      Constructs a mixed fraction with a given fraction only.
